author: Staff Reporter
text:
A woman was killed and 12 others were injured when the van in which they were travelling fell into a 100-foot-deep gorge on Palani-Kodaikanal Ghat Road at Saverikadu near here on Wednesday. The deceased was identified as S. Anju of Ernakulam in Kerala.

The accident took place when Sinoj, his wife Anju and her family members were returning home from Kodaikanal in the evening. The van driver lost control over the vehicle, which fell into the gorge.

All the injured, including three women and three children, were rushed to Palani Government Hospital. The body of Anju was also sent to the hospital post-mortem.
title: Woman dies as van plunges into gorge
